description:
When we deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> backrow enemy.
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw:
When we deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, Stun the Strongest backrow enemy.
Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to all enemies.
flavorText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."
name: Swain
